reviews.title: Not good
reviews.body: Iâ€™ve been having ongoing issues with Instagram for a long time now. Iâ€™m unable to log into my account through the app, even after changing my password multiple times. Each time, the app tells me my password is incorrect, but Iâ€™m able to log in on the website without any problems using the same information. This has been really frustrating because it seems like the issue is with the app itself, not my account. Iâ€™ve tried basic troubleshooting, but nothing has fixed it so far. I hope this problem gets addressed because it makes the app difficult to use.
reviews.body_cleaned: Iâ€™ve been having ongoing issues with Instagram for a long time now. Iâ€™m unable to log into my account through the app, even after changing my password multiple times. Each time, the app tells me my password is incorrect, but Iâ€™m able to log in on the website without any problems using the same information. This has been really frustrating because it seems like the issue is with the app itself, not my account. Iâ€™ve tried basic troubleshooting, but nothing has fixed it so far. I hope this problem gets addressed because it makes the app difficult to use.

reviews.title: Poor feedback and no customer service
reviews.body: Hello, iâ€™ve had a single instagram account for over 8 years (chino_.png), iâ€™ve gotten a total of 4 chatbans for ppl trolling and reporting me but thatâ€™s all the trouble iâ€™ve gotten. then on August 5, 2025 i get suspended for supposedly breaking the guidelines of Community Standards of dangerous individuals and organizations. thinking this could be resolved quickly, i appealed and waited a few days but then never got a response for the appeal. then as i tried to search for a way to get help, i realized there wasnâ€™t besides some forums that werenâ€™t of any help! so after a bit i tried to make some new accounts but they get banned for account integrity and not giving a reason why? then i made an account in november and had it for 2 months when that got banned for the same reason (acc integrity). then i realized i had another account and i decided to use that just to text 2 group chats i was in but then that gets suspended for the exact same reason my first account was suspended and again, no reason as to why
reviews.body_cleaned: Hello, iâ€™ve had a single instagram account for over 8 years (chino_.png), iâ€™ve gotten a total of 4 chatbans for ppl trolling and reporting me but thatâ€™s all the trouble iâ€™ve gotten. then on August 5, 2025 i get suspended for supposedly breaking the guidelines of Community Standards of dangerous individuals and organizations. thinking this could be resolved quickly, i appealed and waited a few days but then never got a response for the appeal. then as i tried to search for a way to get help, i realized there wasnâ€™t besides some forums that werenâ€™t of any help! so after a bit i tried to make some new accounts but they get banned for account integrity and not giving a reason why? then i made an account in november and had it for 2 months when that got banned for the same reason (acc integrity). then i realized i had another account and i decided to use that just to text 2 group chats i was in but then that gets suspended for the exact same reason my first account was suspended and again, no reason as to why

reviews.title: Difficult to make a Story
reviews.body:
I donâ€™t know what Instagram did but their way of creating stories changed. Its now extremely hard to drag and move stickers. My photos keep changing the order in which they over lap even though I didnâ€™t even click on it or anywhere near it. 
They need to go back to the old way cause this new one is making me not want to create stories. 
Oh and you use to be able to rotate stickers by clicking on it and they disabled that feature a long time ago and I wish that would come back. Iâ€™m starting to not like Instagram for these reasons.
reviews.body_cleaned: I donâ€™t know what Instagram did but their way of creating stories changed. Its now extremely hard to drag and move stickers. My photos keep changing the order in which they over lap even though I didnâ€™t even click on it or anywhere near it. They need to go back to the old way cause this new one is making me not want to create stories. Oh and you use to be able to rotate stickers by clicking on it and they disabled that feature a long time ago and I wish that would come back. Iâ€™m starting to not like Instagram for these reasons.

reviews.title: Fix the GIFs NOW PLEASE
reviews.body:
I had my issues with this app (Meta) for many reasons but now Iâ€™m upset because they took away the old GIF library in the comments.

Responding with GIFs was such a huge part of IG for me, as someone who doesnâ€™t post and only comments. Sometimes the perfect comment is a GIF, a sentiment that canâ€™t be articulated.

It feels* like censorship and I donâ€™t like it. If IG wonâ€™t return the old GIF library/ selection, at least let us reply with GIFs from our own keyboard or camera roll. Until they fix this I wonâ€™t be on the app much.
reviews.body_cleaned: I had my issues with this app (Meta) for many reasons but now Iâ€™m upset because they took away the old GIF library in the comments. Responding with GIFs was such a huge part of IG for me, as someone who doesnâ€™t post and only comments. Sometimes the perfect comment is a GIF, a sentiment that canâ€™t be articulated. It feels* like censorship and I donâ€™t like it. If IG wonâ€™t return the old GIF library/ selection, at least let us reply with GIFs from our own keyboard or camera roll. Until they fix this I wonâ€™t be on the app much.

reviews.title: Permanently banned for something I did not do. Legal action is being taken.
reviews.body:
Iâ€™m convinced Instagram is actually the worst app right now. I had my account for over five years with no issues and out of nowhere it gets suspended. I appealed it and literally less than one minute later it was permanently disabled. How do you review anything in under a minute?? That alone shows nobody even looked at anything, this decision was already made and the whole appeal system is just a fake button to make users feel like thereâ€™s a process. THERE ISNâ€™T. And then they ask me to send my ID to verify my identity this is something personal and they STILL banned me?? What tf?? They have my info in their system and still permanently disable me for a false accusation. Thatâ€™s insane.

Then I used another older account I had, turned it into my main since my previous one got banned and everything seemed fine. I barely posted, didnâ€™t violate anything, nothing suspicious at all. Weeks go by everythingâ€™s normal then one morning I wake up and itâ€™s suspended  with the message that stated  â€œmy account may be associated with another account that didnâ€™t follow community guidelinesâ€. I was asleep. What exactly did I violate while I was unconscious? How does that make any sense??? Why even allow me to create or log into anything if youâ€™re going to keep banning it for being linked to something you already handled?

At this point, just be transparent and say you donâ€™t want people to make new accounts after a ban. The way devices and IPs get punished is TERRIBLE. Wrongfully accusing people with no proof, no explanation, no case, and no warning is ridiculous. Itâ€™s insane that a system is allowed to permanently wipe out accounts with no human being involved ğŸ˜¬. Instagram really trusts decisions made by an automated AI moderation system that clearly cannot understand CONTEXT or NUANCE. And itâ€™s even worse that you canâ€™t speak to a HUMAN unless you pay for a subscription.

Meanwhile the people who ACTUALLY should be banned like the scammers, the predators, the creeps, the bots, the hate and gossip accounts are just sitting there not getting affected at all. But normal people like me are getting wiped out for simply existing or for being â€œassociated.â€ This just feels like regular users are disposable unless theyâ€™re paying for Meta Verified or theyâ€™re famous thatâ€™s honestly pathetic.

Iâ€™m contacting a lawyer on Wednesday and I am starting my lawsuit against Meta. Iâ€™m done being treated like this. Iâ€™m going to speak up for all the people this is happening to. The reliance on robots over humans will be the downfall of this app, MARK MY WORDSS!!! Theyâ€™ll see me in court.

I appealed it and literally less than one minute later it was permanently disabled. How do you review anything in under a minute?? That alone shows nobody even looked at anything, this decision was already made and the whole appeal system is just a fake button to make users feel like thereâ€™s a process. THERE ISNâ€™T. And then they ask me to send my ID to verify my identity this is something personal and they STILL banned me?? What tf?? They have my info in their system and still permanently disable me for a false accusation. Thatâ€™s insane. Then I used another older account I had, turned it into my main since my previous one got banned and everything seemed fine. I barely posted, didnâ€™t violate anything, nothing suspicious at all. Weeks go by everythingâ€™s normal then one morning I wake up and itâ€™s suspended with the message that stated â€œmy account may be associated with another account that didnâ€™t follow community guidelinesâ€. I was asleep. What exactly did I violate while I was unconscious? How does that make any sense??? Why even allow me to create or log into anything if youâ€™re going to keep banning it for being linked to something you already handled? At this point, just be transparent and say you donâ€™t want people to make new accounts after a ban. The way devices and IPs get punished is TERRIBLE. Itâ€™s insane that a system is allowed to permanently wipe out accounts with no human being involved ğŸ˜¬. reviews.title: Ad Slop and using conversations to advertise.
reviews.body:
Seems theyâ€™ve gone even more degen with shoveling ads and slop down your throat. Legit canâ€™t even open up stories without receiving 1 ad per 2 peopleâ€™s stories. Sometimes you even get 2 ads in between a story.

Also seems they are using ai to analyze your images and messages sent to advertise to you. Sent a picture of a product to a friend in dmâ€™s and within an hour had it show up 5 times. Additionally, itâ€™s been 2 days and I get the ad every 20 seconds on the app.

Degen levels of ad pumping.

This app sucks.

reviews.title: Falsely banned
reviews.body: Iâ€™ve had the same Instagram account for the past 10 years. This year my account was suspended for something I didnâ€™t do. I appealed and was given my account back, then on Christmas Day it was permanently banned again for the same reason that I didnâ€™t do but now itâ€™s permanently banned. I lost all my friends that I was only connected with on Insta as well as my Facebook which I use to keep up with distant relatives. Absolutely terrible support system and no ability to talk to a real person.

Now the story editor is basically unusable. Trying to add image layers they always get placed on the bottom and then you have to try to press and hold to bring it to the top but then you canâ€™t move it around the image so when you try to press again, it touches another layer and puts the original one in the bottom again itâ€™s pathetic
